content: make a cuddly and educational toy for your little ones easy pattern for making 3d cubes that are suitable for babies toddlers and older children the cubes have dots like dice and each side is made separability allowing for the using of multiple colours each panel is crocheted seamlessly in the round for a tidy finish additional info available at the pattern page resale although this pattern is free it is strictly prohibited to edit duplicate or sell the pattern itself but you can sell any physical item that you make from the pattern
